languages.text: "Часть десятины я оставил{mf||а} себе, это верно. Она пойдет на куда более важные вещи, чем просто гнить на складе. Остальным вы можете распоряжаться как угодно".
"I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."
languages.original_text: "Часть десятины я оставил{mf||а} себе, это верно. Она пойдет на куда более важные вещи, чем просто гнить на складе. Остальным вы можете распоряжаться как угодно".

traits.locale_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."
"I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."
"I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."
"I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."
"I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

languages.text: "Ich habe einen Teil des Zehnts einbehalten, das stimmt. Ich gedenke, ihn sinnvoll zu nutzen, anstatt ihn in irgendeinem Lagerhaus verrotten zu lassen. Mit dem Rest könnt Ihr machen, was Ihr wollt."
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe einen Teil des Zehnts einbehalten, das stimmt. Ich gedenke, ihn sinnvoll zu nutzen, anstatt ihn in irgendeinem Lagerhaus verrotten zu lassen. Mit dem Rest könnt Ihr machen, was Ihr wollt."

languages.text: « C'est vrai, j'ai conservé une partie de la dîme par-devers moi. Elle sera employée à bien meilleur escient que si elle croupissait dans un quelconque entrepôt. Je vous laisse le soin de gérer le reste comme bon vous semble. »
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai, j'ai conservé une partie de la dîme par-devers moi. Elle sera employée à bien meilleur escient que si elle croupissait dans un quelconque entrepôt. Je vous laisse le soin de gérer le reste comme bon vous semble. »

languages.text: “我取走了一部分什一税，这点确实没错。比起放在仓库里烂掉，它在我手里能发挥更大的作用。至于剩下的事情，你愿意怎么说就怎么说吧。”
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: “我取走了一部分什一税，这点确实没错。比起放在仓库里烂掉，它在我手里能发挥更大的作用。至于剩下的事情，你愿意怎么说就怎么说吧。”

languages.text: «Me guardé una porción del diezmo para mi uso personal, es cierto. Le encontraré un uso mucho mejor que dejar que se pudra en un almacén. Pueden administrar el resto como consideren oportuno».
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: «Me guardé una porción del diezmo para mi uso personal, es cierto. Le encontraré un uso mucho mejor que dejar que se pudra en un almacén. Pueden administrar el resto como consideren oportuno».

languages.text: 「租税の一部を自分のために取っておいたのは事実だ。だが、倉庫で朽ちさせるよりは、はるかに有意義に使われるだろう。残りは君の裁量で処理して構わない」
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: 「租税の一部を自分のために取っておいたのは事実だ。だが、倉庫で朽ちさせるよりは、はるかに有意義に使われるだろう。残りは君の裁量で処理して構わない」

languages.text: "Aşarın bir kısmını kendime ayırdığım doğrudur. Deponun birinde çürümeye terk etmekten çok daha faydalı işlerde kullanacağım. Kalanını uygun gördüğünüz gibi değerlendirirsiniz."
languages.original_text: "I kept a portion of the tithe for myself, it is true. It will be put to far better use than being left to rot away in some warehouse. You may administer the rest as you see fit."

traits.locale_text: "Aşarın bir kısmını kendime ayırdığım doğrudur. Deponun birinde çürümeye terk etmekten çok daha faydalı işlerde kullanacağım. Kalanını uygun gördüğünüz gibi değerlendirirsiniz."
